quote: There is a marvelous turn and trick to British arrogance; its apparent unconsciousness makes it twice as effectual.

author.name: David Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Turville

quote: The naturalists of our own time hold equal faith in the wonders of the sea, but seek therein rather for the links of nature's chain than for apparent exceptions.
